content.pageManagement:
Manage pages:
All existing pages are organized in list with basic information.
User can preview (with normal page only),
edit or delete page if you have right.
User can search page by Owner type (portal/group/user), by Owner id (name of owner type), or by Page name.
To create new page, click "Add new page" button and input required fields.
content.portalManagement:
Manage Portals:
This is the list of all existing portals. To create new,click "Create new Portal" button and input required fields.
User only can create or delete a portal from list if he has right.
content.pageWizard2:
Step 1: Setting page's information includes Page's path, Node name, Displayed name.
Do as the followings:
- Select navigation from list
- Select page to create page as sub-page of selected page
- Input Node Name
- Input Display Name (option)
- Check Visible check box (option)
- Check Publication date & time check box (option)
  If Publication date & time check box is checked:
  - Input Start Publication Date
  - Input End Publication Date
- Click "Next" to move to next step
content.pageWizard3:
Step 2: Setting page's layout.
Do as the followings:
- Select one of available layouts from list
- Click "Next" to move to next step or "Back" to return to previous step
content.pageEditWizard:
Page Edit Wizard description
and guide goes here.
content.pageEditWizard1:
Step1: Allows to change Display name of page.
Do as the followings:
- Select navigation from list
- Select page that you want to edit
- Change Display name if needed
- Set or ignore Visible by check or uncheck its check box
- Set or ignore Publication date & time by check or uncheck its check box
  If set Publication date & time:
    - Change Start Publication Date if needed
    - Change End Publication Date if needed
- Click "Next" to move to next step
content.pageEditWizard2:
Step 2: Re-setting page's layout.
Do as the followings:
- Select new page layout or keep current layout
- Click "Next" to move to next step or "Back" to return to previous step
content.pageEditWizard3:
Step 2: Re-setting page's layout.
Do as the followings:
- Select new page layout or keep current layout
- Click "Next" to move to next step or "Back" to return to previous step

UIForgetPasswordWizard.title: ما منع من الحصول على إكزو؟
UIForgetPasswordWizard.info:
نعتذر عن الإزعاج من جراء عدم قدرتهم على الحصول على إكزو.
لحل هذه المسألة بأسرع ما يمكن ، يرجى اتباع الخطوات التالية لاستكشاف الأخطاء وإصلاحها
اتبع التعليمات بالضبط للحصول على أفضل النتائج :

1. استعادة كلمة السر :أدخل اسم المستخدم الخاص بك ثم انقر فوق إرسال
2. استعادة اسم المستخدم : أدخل عنوان البريد الإلكتروني الخاص بك ثم انقر فوق إرسال

msg.user-delete: اسم المستخدم تم حذفه من قبل مخطط النظام
msg.user-not-exist: اسم مستخدمك لا وجود له في إكزو
msg.expration: Your link is expired, you have to get another email active

mail.header: شكرا على اتصالك مركزالمساعدة لبوابة إكزو. لقد قدمت طلبا لاسم المستخدم وكلمة السر
mail.link: يمكنك بعد ذلك طلب كلمة سر جديدة لاسم المستخدم الرجاء الضغط على هذه الوصلة

UIWizardWelcome.WelcomeLabel: Welcome you to eXo Page Creation Wizard !
UIWizardWelcome.WelcomeText: This Wizard will walk you through the creation of a new page. It guides you through entering the information necessary for creating a new page. When you are done entering the required information, you will be prompted to save your new page. And, it is the easy way by click on the "Back" and "Next" buttons or select the step number to navigate the steps.
